patterns: How much does the course cost?
responses: Fees can vary depending on the course, but no worries! All the details are on our fees page: www.university.edu/fees. Scholarships and financial aid info is there too, so take a look.
Hey there! How can I help you today? Feel free to ask me anything!
Hello! I'm here to assist you with whatever you need!
Hey! What can I do for you today?
Yes, we do offer hostel facilities. You can check availability and apply on our hostel page: www.university.edu/hostel.
The library is open from 8 AM to 8 PM, Monday to Friday. You can borrow books using your student ID, and we also have online resources. Check them out at www.university.edu/library.

patterns: How to get a bus pass?
responses: Yes, we've got you covered with transport! Check out bus schedules and pass info at www.university.edu/transport.
For the latest events and activities, just head over to our events page: www.university.edu/events. Join in on the fun!

patterns: How can I contact my professor?
responses: You can find all the faculty details and how to contact them right here: www.university.edu/faculty.
You can reach us anytime at contact@university.edu or call us at +123-456-7890. Our location details are also available at www.university.edu/contact.
We've got a lot of options! From undergraduate to postgraduate programs, you can find all the details at www.university.edu/courses. Take a look and find the one that fits you!

patterns: Where can I check my results?
responses: You can check your results on the student portal under 'Exam Results', or you can visit www.university.edu/results to access them directly.
Yes, we offer internship opportunities in collaboration with industry partners. You can find the latest openings at www.university.edu/internships.

patterns: Does the university have placement support?
responses: Absolutely! Our career services help with placement support. Check out more details at www.university.edu/placements.

patterns: How to join a sports team?
responses: Yes, we've got a great sports setup! Whether it's teams or gym facilities, you can check it all out at www.university.edu/sports.
We have several scholarship options, including merit-based ones. Check out all the details at www.university.edu/scholarships.

patterns: How to apply for a student visa?
Do I need a visa to study?
responses: Yes, international students need to apply for a student visa. You can check out the requirements on our website or contact the international office for assistance.

patterns: Is there a clinic on campus?
responses: We have a campus clinic that offers health services. For more info, visit www.university.edu/health.
Yes, we offer counseling services. You can schedule an appointment or find more details at www.university.edu/counseling.
We'd love to hear your thoughts! Please visit www.university.edu/feedback to share your suggestions with us.
